pull.title: [29.x] bump to v29.0rc1
pull.body:
- "backport" #32041 
- bump version to v29.0rc1
- generate manpages
- add example bitcoin.conf
- add release-notes.md pointing to wiki

Rebased-From: a3f0e9a
